summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TradeMetryx financial analytics platform. Backend APIs working well (90.9% success rate) with one minor datetime bug fixed. Frontend flows working perfectly including registration, login, analytics data loading, symbol switching, and backtest execution.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized requests
minor_issues.impact: Minor - both status codes indicate unauthorized access

fixed_bugs.issue: TypeError: can't compare offset-naive and offset-aware datetimes
fixed_bugs.fix_applied: Updated parse_iso function to ensure all datetimes are timezone-aware

passed_tests: Frontend registration flow with redirect to /app/analytics
Frontend login flow with JWT persistence
Protected routes redirect to /login when logged out
Analytics page symbol loading and switching
Navigation between Analytics and Backtest pages
